root.name: append()

example.code: sa1 = ["OH", "NY", "CA"] sa1.append("MA") println(sa1) # Prints updated list contents to the console: # [0] "OH" # [1] "NY" # [2] "CA" # [3] "MA"

root.description: Expands a list by one element and adds data to the new position. You can store any type inside a list, and you can make a list that contains different data types.
